sentences: Ta istus oma aja ära ning pääses vanglast välja.
Lennart Meri oli Eesti presidendiks kaks aega järjest.
context: The word 'istus' has multiple meanings in Estonian. It can be the third-person singular past indicative form of the verb 'istuma' meaning 'to sit', or it can refer to a time period or era when used in certain contexts. Based on the dictionary definitions provided, 'istus' appears most commonly as the past tense form of 'to sit'.
